posts.post_content: I'm not terribly fond of this card, and I started in Masques. Even then, 5 for a 3/3 flyer was too much, and the 3 life doesn't do too much. I can pay 3WW and get 3 life once, or I can pay 1BB for a Nighthawk and net at least 2 life, and maybe even one of their creatures. (And before you tell me that they are different colors, think of which color of the two should be better at gaining life..) Overall the efficiency of this card isn't very impressive.
